meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elizabeth Edwards Sean O'Connor Kirby Burnett Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6297.

td.p: Elizabeth Edwards, a graduate student in museum studies from Hendersonville, Tennessee
Sean O'Connor, an attorney originally from St. Louis, Missouri
Kirby Burnett, a poker dealer from Prior Lake, Minnesota (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,600)

tr.td: CANADIAN POSTAL ABBREVIATIONS
MUSIC ALPHABET
TV REALITY SHOWS BY WINNER
NEW AGE THINKING
LET'S TAKE A "TRIP"
YOU'LL NEED INSURANCE
